value.title: 12 African countries sign AI Ethics Code at Russia-Africa summit

value.title: More Battlefield AI Will Make the Fog of War More Deadly
value.excerpt: The Pentagon’s embrace of military AI raises questions about what limits should be placed on the technology—and how to keep humans in control.

value.title: Medical students recognize AI's potential in medicine, call for ethical education

value.title: Graft is building an AI development platform for the masses
value.excerpt: Graft is attempting to take the complexity out of building AI applications with a templatized approach to development.

value.title: How Does Artificial Intelligence Create New Jobs?
value.excerpt: While AI may reduce the demand for some jobs, it can also create new employment opportunities in previously unexplored areas.

value.title: AI appears more human on social media than actual humans: study
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence study published in Science Advances found that AI-generated text on social media can appear more human than human-generated content.

value.title: State of IT report: Generative AI will soon go mainstream, say 9 out of 10 IT leaders
value.excerpt: Generative AI has only recently become mainstream. The report shows 86% of IT leaders believe generative AI will have a prominent role it their organization in the near future. Yet 64% of IT leaders are concerned about the ethics of generative AI, and 62% are concerned about its impacts on their careers.
